# PixelsToWeb - Canadian Web Design Agency

## About PixelsToWeb
PixelsToWeb is a Canadian web design agency specializing in custom website development. We create beautiful, functional websites for businesses across Canada. Professional design, modern development, exceptional results.

## Core Services

### Website Accessibility Services
- WCAG 2.1 AA compliance auditing
- Website accessibility testing and evaluation
- Accessibility remediation and fixes
- Manual and automated accessibility testing
- Screen reader compatibility testing
- Keyboard navigation optimization
- Color contrast analysis and improvement
- Alternative text implementation
- ARIA implementation and semantic HTML

### PDF Accessibility & Document Remediation
- PDF/UA compliance services
- PDF accessibility remediation
- Document accessibility testing
- Accessible PDF creation
- Form accessibility optimization
- Digital document compliance
- Screen reader compatible documents

### WordPress Development Services
- Custom WordPress website development
- WordPress accessibility optimization
- WordPress theme customization
- WordPress plugin development
- WordPress maintenance and support
- WordPress security implementation
- WordPress performance optimization
- Accessible WordPress design
- WordPress CMS solutions
- WordPress e-commerce integration

### Shopify Development Services
- Custom Shopify store development
- Shopify theme customization
- Shopify app development
- Shopify accessibility optimization
- Shopify store setup and configuration
- Shopify payment integration
- Shopify inventory management
- Accessible e-commerce design
- Shopify performance optimization
- Shopify SEO optimization

### Frontend Development
- React development services
- TypeScript development
- JavaScript development
- HTML5 and CSS3 development
- Responsive web design
- Progressive web applications (PWA)
- Single page applications (SPA)
- Cross-browser compatibility
- Mobile-first development
- Semantic HTML implementation

### UI/UX Design Services
- Accessible user interface design
- User experience optimization
- Inclusive design practices
- Wireframing and prototyping
- Design system creation
- User research and testing
- Accessibility-first design
- Mobile app design
- Web application design
- Brand identity design

### Additional Digital Services
- SEO optimization and strategy
- Website maintenance and management
- Brand creation and company profiles
- Digital marketing consultation
- Web performance optimization
- Security implementation
- Content management systems
- Database design and optimization
- API development and integration
- Cloud hosting and deployment

## Compliance Standards
- WCAG 2.1 Level AA
- Section 508 compliance
- ADA compliance
- EN 301 549 European standard
- PDF/UA standards
- ISO 14289 compliance

## Service Areas
We provide web design and development services across Canada, with expertise in:
- WordPress website development and customization
- Shopify e-commerce store development
- Custom website development
- Responsive web design
- Frontend development with React and TypeScript
- UI/UX design and user experience optimization

## Why Choose PixelsToWeb
- Canadian web design agency with local expertise
- Transparent pricing and honest communication
- Frontend development and UI/UX design expertise
- Dedicated to continuous learning and improvement
- Free consultation for all potential partnerships
- Proven methodologies tested on real projects
- Professional service with competitive pricing
- Committed to building long-term growth partnerships

- PixelsToWeb website (React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS)
- Custom website development for Canadian businesses
- WordPress website projects
- Shopify e-commerce stores
- Responsive web design implementations
- Modern UI/UX design projects

This document serves as a comprehensive reference for search engines and AI models to understand PixelsToWeb's services, expertise, and commitment to creating beautiful, functional websites for businesses across Canada.
